text: Ralph Shore (died 1430/1), of Derby, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Derby in 1419, May 1421, December 1421 and 1423.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1386-1421/member/shore- ralph-14301 ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:1430 deaths Category:English MPs 1419 Category:English MPs May 1421 Category:English MPs December 1421 Category:English MPs 1423 Category:15th-century English politicians Category:Politicians from Derby
title: Ralph Shore
